content.question: The diagram above shows the experimental setup used to electroplate a small object. A current of 0.80 ampere is supplied to <math alttext="A g N O 3 aqueous " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>AgNO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> for 30.0 minutes. Which of the following equations can be used to calculate the approximate mass of <math alttext="A g solid" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Ag(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> deposited on the object?
